entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lévis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:37 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning this evening. Amount 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain near noon. Snow over northern sections. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low zero.
